content: Moose are not the only animals to benefit from these protected lands; bald eagles, river otters, and ravens, along with more than a dozen other animals, have been returning to the Adirondacks over the last few decades. That's drawn a lot of attention from wildlife conservationists the world over.
translations: ita:Le alci non sono gli unici animali a trarre beneficio da queste terre protette; aquile calve, lontre di fiume e corvi, i
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Cangarejo (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
